mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lmsNotice( lmsNoticeNo, lmsNoticeTitle, lmsNoticeContent, lmsNoticeCreateTime ) VALUES ( #{lmsNoticeNo}, #{lmsNoticeTitle}, #{lmsNoticeContent}, #{lmsNoticeCreatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lmsNotice SET lmsNoticeTitle = #{lmsNoticeTitle}, lmsNoticeContent = #{lmsNoticeContent}, WHERE lmsNoticeNo = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT lmsNoticeNo lmsNoticeNo, lmsNoticeTitle lmsNoticeTitle, lmsNoticeContent lmsNoticeContent, lmsNoticeCreatetime lmsNoticeCreatetime, lmsNoticeUpdatetime lmsNoticeUpdatetime FROM lmsNotice WHERE lmsNoticeNo=#{lmsNoticeNo}
